headline: AI’s Water Demand to Surge Nearly 130% by 2050 – New Research Shows How to Build a Water-Secure AI Economy
summary: WASHINGTON, January 14, 2026--New research by Xylem (NYSE: XYL) and Global Water Intelligence finds AI's water demand could more than double by 2050.

headline: 2 Reasons to Like XYL and 1 to Stay Skeptical
summary: Xylem trades at $140.11 and has moved in lockstep with the market. Its shares have returned 7% over the last six months while the S&P 500 has gained 11.3%.
